name: Knights of the Poker Table
description:
THE STORY

The year is 1322 - The Year of The Gambler.

You are a knight and are late to the annual poker game at the castle. You must get there as soon as possible, but enemies block your way.

Luckily for you, you own the Devils Dice, which allows you to cheat fate itself.

With it you can choose to re-roll the actions of your enemies and friends.

But remember, you can only use the dice 4 times per turn, so think carefully!

At the same time, you need money for the poker game, because you are BROKE. Luckily, monsters feel bad for you and will give you money after attacking you.

Can you ride the line between getting enough money and actually getting to the castle? The amount of money you have may determine the outcome of the poker game.

THE CONTROLS

Space - Confirm

Right/D - Menu right

Left/A - Menu left

OTHER

this game was made within 48 hours for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam, with the theme being "Roll of the Dice"

all assets, including art, music and code were made within those 48 hours.

If you are playing within thee voting period, please remember to vote for the game, and leave feedback if able as it is very helpful to me.

Thanks for playing!
